updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Updated foil chances. Now scales rarity by appopriate C/U/R/M odds.

updates.htmlString: Removed tip cards and fixed some card data.
Upgraded to the new generator version.
Morning: There is now only a one in 53 chance per pack of getting a Power Nine card. Thanks, x1a4!
